LDM R0, 1
1001111 000000000
0000000000000001
LDM R1, AAAA
1001111 000000001
1010101010101010
LDM R2, FFFF
1001111 000000010
1111111111111111
DEC R0
0010001 000000000
MOV R4, R1	
0001111 000001100
NOT R1
0010011 001000001
MOV R3, R0
0001111 000000011
DEC R0
0010001 000000000
CMP R4, R2
0001010 100010000
OR R5, R1, R4
0001100 001100101
MOV R6, R0
0001111 000000110
CMP R2, R4
0001010 010100000
CMP R5, R0
0001010 101000000
OR R7, R4, R3
0001100 100011111
NOT R6
0010011 110000110
DEC R0
0010001 000000000
